(of a city) covered with buildings across a large area, often ones that have been added gradually over a period of time: sprawling suburbs Somewhere in this sprawling metropolis, there is a secret military laboratory. See
sprawl
More examplesFewer examplesWe pulled into a sprawling industrial complex.The sprawling medical school campus is on the grounds of a former naval academy.She moves into Manuela's tiny shack in one of the city's sprawling slums.
